comments.body: It would be good to put a descriptive comment before this function. The comment should describe what the function's purpose is, and what it does at a very high level. The comment at the start of the function body is too low level, and reads more like a program itself than is good.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +312,316 @@ */
static void
arr_insert_loop(char *mptr, char *vptr, char *input_data, char *zero,
                char *avals_data, int melsize, int delsize, int objarray,
                int totmask, int numvals, int nd, npy_intp *instrides,
